content:
__The utterance:__

Hello, I would greatly appreciate it if you could provide me with information regarding whether your post office remains open during public holidays? I'm explicitly interested in getting some info on how you operate on the Thanksgiving day.  I just moved to a new apartment in Brooklyn so I need to update my details in my account in your organization. I'm expecting a number of official shipments from immigration office so I need to be sure that I receive these important communications in a timely manner, preventing any potential legal or financial complications.

__Instructions__

For the text you were provided, please assign the corresponding intent from the list above.  Each intent in the list has Intent Id, Intent name and Intent description.
Extract all entities that you consider important within the text for every intent identified. 
Important! Your output must be in json. When answering please use intent Ids.
